summary: A young man comes to the rescue of his girlfriend abducted by thieves and brought to Rio. An extravagant adventure ensues.
cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo|Françoise Dorléac|Jean Servais|Roger Dumas|Daniel Ceccaldi|Milton Ribeiro|Ubiracy De Oliveira|Sabu Do Brasil|Adolfo Celi|Simone Renant|Aubry|Christian Bagot|Robert Blome|Louise Chevalier|Sebastião de Oliveira|Max Elloy|Osmar Ferrão|Maurice Hartwig|Zé Keti|Hal Linden|Annik Malvil|Marie Marc|Nina Myral|Suzana Negri|Piervil|Lucien Raimbourg|Tarcísio Ramos|Ubirajara Silva|André Tomasi
keywords: man hits a woman|man slaps a woman|eiffel tower|saloon singer|bowling alley
title: El hombre de Río
